```r
# Calculate silhouette width for many k using PAM
sil_width <- c(NA)
for(i in 2:10){
  pam_fit <- pam(gower_dist,
                 diss = TRUE,
                 k = i)
  sil_width[i] <- pam_fit$silinfo$avg.width
}
# Plot sihouette width (higher is better)
plot(1:10, sil_width,
     xlab = \Optimal k clusters\"
